# FeatureSet

**Structure**

The features supported by PaperKit UI / data models.

## Declaration

```swift
struct FeatureSet
```

## Structures

- **FeatureSet.LineMarkerPositions**: Which ends of an line can have arrows.

## Instance Properties

- **colorMaximumLinearExposure**: The maximum exposure to allow for choosing colors.
- **contentVersion**: The version of PaperKit supported.
- **features**: The supported features.
- **inks**: The inks types that are supported.
- **lineMarkerPositions**: The allowed ends of line for arrows.
- **shapes**: The supported shape types.

## Instance Methods

- **contains(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the given feature exists in the set.
- **insert(_:)**: Inserts the given feature in the set if it is not already present.
- **isSubset(of:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether this feature set is a subset of the given feature set.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes the given feature.

## Type Properties

- **empty**: A maximally empty feature set.
- **latest**: A new feature set supporting all features.
- **version1**: A new feature set supporting all features in `.version1`.

## Enumerations

- **FeatureSet.ContentVersion**
- **FeatureSet.Feature**: The features that PaperKit markup supports.

## Configuration

- **ShapeConfiguration**: A configuration that specifies the appearance of a shape.
- **RenderingOptions**: The rendering options for drawing paper data models.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
